title: 2048 Game Implementation
description: Build a complete 2048 game in a single HTML file with CSS and JS included. The game features a 4x4 grid, keyboard controls (Arrow/WASD), random tile spawning (90% '2', 10% '4'), score tracking, game over detection, and specific color styling for tiles.

nodes.title: Setup HTML Structure
nodes.description: Create the base HTML file. Include a semantic structure with a header (title, score board), a main game container (grid background), and a footer. Link CSS and JS within the same file.

nodes.title: Design Visual Style (CSS)
nodes.description: Implement CSS for the game. Target a 4x4 grid. Use specific hex codes for tiles: #eee4da (2), #ede0c8 (4), #f2b179 (8), #f59563 (16), #f67c5f (32), #f65e3b (64), #edcf72 (128), #edcc61 (256), #edc850 (512), #edc53f (1024), #edc22e (2048). Ensure responsive layout and smooth animations for tile movements and merges.

nodes.title: Implement Game Logic (JS)
nodes.description: Write JavaScript to handle core mechanics. Handle Arrow keys and WASD for input. Implement random spawn with a 90% chance of 2 and 10% chance of 4. Create the data structure to hold the 4x4 grid state.

nodes.title: Merge Game Assets
nodes.description: Combine HTML structure, CSS styling, and JavaScript logic into a single, self-contained '2048_Game.html' artifact. Ensure all tags are closed and scripts are functional.

nodes.title: Verify Game Logic
nodes.description: Ensure tile movement, merging, score tracking, and game over states work as intended. Validate that inputs (WASD/Arrows) trigger the correct updates and that the random spawn probabilities are adhered to.

nodes.title: Root Task
nodes.goal_statement:
创建一个2048的游戏
